name: NIHAL RAJEPATIL
summary: Immediate joiner, Data Scientist with 4.7 years of expertise in Statistical analytics, Machine Learning, and NLP. Specialized in analytics to transform complex business requirements into actionable data-driven solutions. Developed scalable chatbots and predictive models. Skilled in Python, pytorch, and TensorFlow.

experience.description: Created conversational AI chatbots, frameworks, and DMS systems. Worked on Transformer-based models for healthcare compliance.
Worked on vast datasets, developed ML models, and ensured client satisfaction through domain expertise.

education.institution: Dr. D.Y.Patil Institute of Management, Pune
Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Marathwada University, Aurangabad

projects.title: Revolutionizing Healthcare Compliance
projects.description: Created a scalable system for intelligent risk assessment and compliance management using ML algorithms and integrated chatbot capabilities for enhanced user interaction.

projects.title: Enhancing Healthcare Claim Prognostication
projects.description: Enhanced healthcare claim prognosis by integrating ML ensembles and biomarker analysis for precise predictive insights in healthcare operations.

projects.title: Development and Analysis of Post-Quantum Cryptography Using Machine Learning
projects.description: Focused on securing communication in the age of quantum computing.

projects.title: Quantum Machine Learning for Optimal Portfolio Optimization
projects.description: Developed methods leveraging quantum algorithms for enhanced financial decision-making.
